amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, $8,000,000 for the United States Intelligence and Security Command's Information Dominance Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3531 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3531 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S7380; text: CR S7380) To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Army, $8,000,000 for the United States Intelligence and Security Command's Information Dominance Center.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3531 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Roberts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3531 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
